Mayor: Splendid! I see you've been practicing! But remember, you can't burrow yourself too long down there. The longer you're burrowed, the more drain you'll be!
You don't want to end up fainting due to a lack of water!
Radish Boy: Alright! I'll take note of that. I'll make sure to drink plenty of water puddles once I'm done burrowing.
Mayor: *cough* *cough* Good, good! Well,I'll be heading home now. It's getting late.
